import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductsManager = ({ products, onRemove,onSubmit }) => { const removeHandle = (id) => { onRemove(id) } const [search, setSearch] = useState(); const handSearch = (e) => { setSearch(e.target.value); if(!onSubmit) return; const formValue ={ search : e.target.value, } onSubmit(formValue) } return (
{/*

{index +1} {name} {price} {textAra}
) } ProductsManager.propTypes = { onSubmit:PropTypes.func } ProductsManager.defaultProps ={ onSubmit:null, } export default ProductsManager
